Define Cell It is a fundamental, structural and functional unit of an organism.
Define Cellular Pool The collection of various types of molecules in a cell is known as cellular pool.
Write a short note on cellular pool. i. There are different types of materials present in the cell which make it possible to carry on all metabolic activities. This collection of various types of molecules in a cell is known as cellular pool. 

 ii. It consists of inorganic material and organic compounds. 

 iii. Inorganic material includes water, salts and mineral ions; while organic compounds are carbohydrates, proteins, lipids, nucleic acids, etc. 

 iv. All the molecules in a cellular pool help in metabolic activities of the cell.
Define metabolism. Explain the parts of metabolism . i. Metabolism means various reactions that occur at cellular level in every living organism. 

 ii. Metabolism consists of two parts, i.e. catabolism and anabolism. 

 iii. In anabolism, new cellular materials are synthesized. 

 iv. In catabolism, complex storage products are hydrolyzed and simpler, smaller products are formed. 

 v. Both anabolic and catabolic reactions require enzymes.
What are macromolecules? Give examples. i. Macromolecules are large sized compounds with high molecular weight but poorly soluble in water. 

 ii. Examples: Proteins, polysaccharides, nucleic acids, etc. Select number of mcqs Please select number of questions: PROCEED Please select difficulty of questions Result About

This app contains Notes, MCQs and mainly video lectures for students preparing for Medical CETs like NEET, MHT CET etc.

 By using exam tool in this app one can generate tests on selected topics and solve them independently anywhere, anytime on his/her mobile phone. This app will work in offline mode so user need not worry about connectivity.

 By watching video lectures and animations in this app user will easily understand the concern topic. This is the only app of its kind and developed by LearningLinks for students of rural and town areas.
LearningLinks is a Leading Coaching Center in Maharashtra which is engaged in providing quality education to science students particularly from rural areas of Ahmednagar district.

 LearningLinks provides coaching for PCMB and post 12 th Medical and Engineering CETs like NEET/MHT/JEE etc.

 Besides regular coaching activities LearningLinks also provides Mobile Learning Software to students and coaching institutes.

 Itâ€™s a ISO 9001:2015 certified state of art Learning facility founded by Prof. Sandeep Chavan.
Prof. Sandeep Chavan: Director, Founder and Educator at LearningLinks.


 He is a Mechanical Engineering Graduate from Pune University. He is well experienced engineer as well as proved himself as a successful educator while working in rural areas like Newasa.

 Mr. Chavan has taught more than 25 subjects of Science and Engineering and also developed several mobile learning applications for students.
